= Introduction =

[http://mosquitto.org/ Mosquitto] is an Open Source MQTT v3.1 message broker written by Roger Light.

= Installing Mosquitto =

Mosquitto can be installed on recent versions of Ubuntu from the normal package repository: [http://manpages.ubuntu.com/cgi-bin/search.py?q=mosquitto mosquitto], [http://manpages.ubuntu.com/cgi-bin/search.py?q=mosquitto_pub mosquitto_pub] and [http://manpages.ubuntu.com/cgi-bin/search.py?q=mosquitto_sub mosquitto_sub] are in the official repositories since the [https://wiki.ubuntu.com/OneiricOcelot Oneiric Ocelot] (Ubuntu 11.10) release.

<pre>
$ sudo apt-get install mosquitto
$ sudo apt-get install mosquitto-clients
</pre>
